price: 27 Qu’en sera-t-il d’eux lorsque, reprenant leurs âmes, les anges les frapperont au visage et sur le dos ?
arabic: فَكَيۡفَ إِذَا تَوَفَّتۡهُمُ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ يَضۡرِبُونَ وُجُوهَهُمۡ وَأَدۡبَٰرَهُمۡ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: fakayfa idhā tawaffathumu al-malāikatu yaḍribūna wujūhahum wa-adbārahum
